name: veracode-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Veracode API integration to access application details and scan results

scripts.test:unit: npm run build && echo "Running unit tests..." && node tests/unit/test-registry.js && node tests/unit/test-argument-validation.js && node tests/unit/test-mcp-protocol.js
scripts.test:integration:mcp: npm run build && echo "Running MCP integration tests..." && node tests/integration/mcp/list-applications-mcp.js && node tests/integration/mcp/search-application-profiles-mcp.js
scripts.test:integration:api: npm run build && echo "Running API integration tests..." && node tests/integration/api/simple-direct-call.js && node tests/integration/api/direct-sca-api-call.js
scripts.example:sca-results: npm run build && echo "Usage: node examples/get-sca-results.js <app-name>" && echo "Example: node examples/get-sca-results.js \"YourAppName\""
scripts.example:find-sca-apps: npm run build && echo "No dedicated find-sca-apps script. Use: node examples/get-sca-results.js <app-name>"
scripts.example:get-static-flaw-info: npm run build && echo "Usage: node examples/get-static-flaw-info.js <app_id> <flaw_id>" && echo "Example: node examples/get-static-flaw-info.js your-app-id 123"
scripts.example:compare-analysis: npm run build && echo "Usage: node examples/compare-analysis-approaches.js <app_name> <flaw_id>" && echo "Example: node examples/compare-analysis-approaches.js \"MyApp\" 123"

author: Dipsylala
